name: Football: The Game
description:
Football the game is a prototype game where you can craft and design plays on a full football team. Place receivers and blockers all around the field and craft your own routes for them to run. Play as the QB in first person to aim and throw the ball, play in 3rd person to catch the ball and run it in for a touchdown before your get tackled or run out of bounds!

(Will need a decent gaming PC to run the game :( working on optimizing for lower end computers)

Controls:

Mouse to aim

Left mouse button to charge, let go to throw

WASD to move

Space bar to jump

Right click as QB for a surprise!
